# Context
The data set was collected using [Multiple Indicator Cluster Survey (MICS)](https://mics.unicef.org/), and it's hosted in [UNICEF's Open Data Portal Data website](https://data.unicef.org/resources/dataset/education-data/). 

The data set contains percentage values as a measure of skill set penetration of various ICT skills across men and women aged 15-24 years in the last 3 months (April 2022-June2022), across ---- countries globally. 



# Goals/Objectives
Discover similar or dissimilar ICT Skills across men and women
